messages.messageBody:
_Why Allowance is the Best Math Curriculum You Can Buy_
Driving past Walgreens today, there's a sign for 75% off clearance...
Hayden (7) very excitedly asks to go in, "because I can get something
worth $16 for only $4!!!"

:) diana
